column1: Little Goat Diner////Ordered the breakfast spaghetti this time. Thought it was a very unique combination of noodles
column5: it just wasn't for me. The broth was a little too salty in my opinion
column6: and I really just regretted not ordering the Bulls Eye French Toast that I was planning on ordering when I went there. I mean overall though
column8: but I guess there are just some things on the menu that I'm not the biggest fan of.
